failed_criteria: Submission photo unreviewable for assessing standard compliance
action_plan: Retake photo for A2: Store Signage & Lighting: Ensure image is clear, well-lit, correctly framed, and accurately shows the required area/details as per policy guidelines.
notes: Submission photo is heavily obstructed by glare, making it impossible to assess signage compliance. ACTION: Escalate for human review due to low confidence.

failed_criteria: Photo framing: the entire sign face is clearly visible and centered.
action_plan: Retake photo ensuring the entire sign face is clearly visible and centered in the frame, without obstructions (e.g., vehicle).
visual_feedback: Left side of the sign is partially obscured by the vehicle and cut off at the image edge.

failed_criteria: Exterior signage is fully illuminated: Confirm that sign bulbs or back-lighting are actually turned on (i.e. you can see the light source glowing).
action_plan: Ensure sign bulbs or back-lighting are turned on so the sign is visibly illuminated; retake the submission photo under these conditions.
visual_feedback: No visible glow or light source on the sign; sign appears unlit.

failed_criteria: Photo framing: the entire sign face is clearly visible and centered
action_plan: Ensure store signage is turned on and visible glowing when taking photo.
Retake photo with the entire sign face centered and fully visible.
visual_feedback: Sign appears unlit; no glow visible from bulbs or back-lighting on window signage.

action_plan: Turn on exterior signage back-lighting so bulbs are visibly glowing, then retake the photo showing the illuminated sign.
visual_feedback: Sign letters appear dark and there is no visible glow from bulbs or back-lighting, indicating the signage is not illuminated.

failed_criteria: Photo framing: the entire sign face is clearly visible and centered.
action_plan: Retake photo to ensure entire sign face is clearly visible and centered: step back or zoom out to capture the full sign, keep camera level.
visual_feedback: The right edge of the sign face is cut off and the sign is not centered in the frame.

action_plan: Ensure exterior signage is turned on with bulbs/back-lighting glowing when taking the photo; retake photo during illumination (e.g., at night or with lights activated).

action_plan: Ensure sign bulbs or back-lighting are turned on so the signage visibly glows; retake the photo when illumination is active.
visual_feedback: No visible internal illumination detected on the Cash 4 You sign; appears unlit.

action_plan: Ensure signage back-lighting or bulbs are turned on and visibly glowing when the photo is taken.

failed_criteria: Photo framing: the entire sign face is clearly visible and centered.

action_plan: Turn on exterior signage lighting before taking submission photo. Ensure that bulbs or back-lighting are visibly glowing.

action_plan: Ensure main exterior signage lighting is turned on before retaking the photo to show bulbs or back-lighting illuminated.

failed_criteria: Exterior signage is fully illuminated: Confirm that sign bulbs or back-lighting are actually turned on (i.e. you can see the light source glowing). Do not count natural daylight or bright-font-on-dark-background contrast as “illumination.”
action_plan: Ensure sign bulbs or back-lighting are turned on (capture photo at night or with illumination active) and retake the photo showing the illuminated sign.
visual_feedback: No visible glow from the sign back-lighting; the sign appears unlit and relies on natural daylight for contrast.

action_plan: Ensure sign lighting is activated and glowing during photo capture; resubmit image showing illuminated signage.
visual_feedback: No visible glow from exterior signage lighting on the store sign panels.
